General.Name: WINSON Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: WINSON Machinery Co., LTD. manufactures and sells machine tool, wind power, ductile iron, and grey iron castings in Taiwan. Its products include beds for grinding M/C, heads for vertical milling M/C, beds for milling M/C, beams for vertical milling M/C, tables for double-column milling M/C, beds for slant lathe, beds for lathe M/C, beds for vertical lathe, and beds for CNC lathe, as well as beams, columns, tables, and beds. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 23, Lugong South 6th Road, Changhua, Taiwan, 505
